title: Question about names
body:
Hello
I want to get a name change and was wondering if names differ from normal in game names to names with special characters (ex: Zach / Zăĉh ) so lets say the name "Zach" is taken can I still change to something like "Zăĉh" and get the name ?
Thanks

replies.body:
Yes you can. On Euw you can use anything within the Latin unicode.
So things like äîžñł for example.

As you can see I have a á in my name and one of my smurf as an žî in it.

> [{quoted}](name=Flash Fláy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tToJk6be,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-13T15:53:14.890+0000)
>
> Yes you can. On Euw you can use anything within the Latin unicode.
> So things like äîžñł for example.
> 
> As you can see I have a á in my name and one of my smurf as an žî in it.

Yes, but like I said, if a name is taken in normal characters like "Flash" can you get the name "Flásh" or will it tell you that the name is already taken?
Since those characters are different, they show up as 2 completely different names. As long as Flásh isn't taken already, you'll be able to have it while someone else has Flash.

Different things.

Me and the owner of Flash Flay are different people, I'll link our op.ggs to show.

Mine: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Flash%20Fl%C3%A1y
His: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Flash%20Flay

You are free to use as many different characters as you want, they are recognised differently.
